[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [FieldMultilineInput](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class._constructor__1_constructor.md)

## FieldMultilineInput.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `FieldMultilineInput` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(opt_value?: string | Sentinel, opt_validator?: FieldMultilineInputValidator, opt_config?: FieldMultilineInputConfig);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_value | string \| Sentinel | <i>(Optional)</i> The initial content of the field. Should cast to a string. Defaults to an empty string if null or undefined. Also accepts Field.SKIP\_SETUP if you wish to skip setup (only used by subclasses that want to handle configuration and setting the field value after their own constructors have run). |
|  opt\_validator | [FieldMultilineInputValidator](./blockly.fieldmultilineinputvalidator_typealias.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> An optional function that is called to validate any constraints on what the user entered. Takes the new text as an argument and returns either the accepted text, a replacement text, or null to abort the change. |
|  opt\_config | FieldMultilineInputConfig | <i>(Optional)</i> A map of options used to configure the field. See the \[field creation documentation\][https://developers.google.com/blockly/guides/create-custom-blocks/fields/built-in-fields/multiline-text-input\#creation](https://developers.google.com/blockly/guides/create-custom-blocks/fields/built-in-fields/multiline-text-input#creation) for a list of properties this parameter supports. |
